name: EpermitSignature
description: Signature details of the Epermit for Live Animals

columns.name: forEpermit
columns.description: Reference to the LiveAnimalsEpermit this Signature applies to

columns.name: signatoryRole
columns.description: Role of the signatory with regards to the ePermit: Applicant; Permit issuer; Issuing Authority or Examining authority

columns.name: signatureTypeCode
columns.description: Code specifying a type of government action such as inspection; detention; fumigation; security.

columns.name: signatureDate
columns.description: Date and time of the signature

columns.name: checks
columns.description: References to the CheckActions performed on the object

columns.name: skeletonIndicator
columns.description: Indicator whether a logistics object is a skeleton object
